name: Survivor Empowerment Program
description: Survivor Empowerment Program provides support circles, education, family support, and other services to survivors of domestic violence. Participants learn safety skills, access resources to care for their basic needs and those of their children, and receive therapeutic and peer support to facilitate their healing. Many of the participants in our SEP program are survivors of the harm caused by men in our RSVP program.
